0: They did us proud the kids could jump out of the infinity pool straight onto the beach for some beach fun
Throughout our stay we have gotten to know some of the staff members well owing to their friendly and hospitable nature
Everyone is super nice helpful and happy people
Beautiful location our room was right on the beach and we got an upgrade on arrival which was most unexpected and really appreciated
Around 15 km long and so make sure you ve got good shoes or they have an excellent buggy service which whips you around places very quickly
The personal touches by the staff are exceptional
StafI hope that the leadership of the Four Seasons will read this review as the staff at Four Seasons Langkawi are exceptional
International Serai restaurant that serve breakfast located near the hotel lobby
The service was impeccable and they went out of their way to take care of us
The team at the Four Seasons Langkawi do too and have shown us how to achieve it consistently
1: I have stayed away from tripadvisor for a couple of years as the trip advisors are not advsing I do not need to know about your vacation or that Jose the waiter coukd juggle your child and 3 plates all at the same time
Guests need to be aware of this prior booking but to be honest it has not been a major problem while there as it is rapidly skipped by all the other features the place has to offer
There is even an outside shower in a private garden courtyard if you are feeling brave
I would characterise the food as being pretty good but not outstanding
That did not suit my wife and I had to speak with the manager to get some fish cooked for her as the staff seemed unwilling or unable to do anything on request
There is not a single light setting that suits for night lights either too bright or too dark risking a fall on the long journey from the bed to the bathroom which includes some steps down
How about a happy hour to get people in thereThe adult pool is lovely but there just are not enough sun beds
No easy way to clear them out I would guess as the ceiling reaches up to 30 ft into the rafters
It was sold as lobster night and that really was it lobster or nothing
Which it is very hard to find this attitude in luxury brand hotels
